overview: With chart-topping albums such as "Kill 'Em All," "Master of Puppets," "â€¦ And Justice for All" and "St. Anger," multi-Grammy Award winners Metallica have established themselves as one of the most successful bands the music business has ever known. With this revealing documentary, fans get a behind-the-scenes look at the inner workings of the iconic heavy metalers via telling, never-before-seen interviews.
title: Metallica: Rock Power: The Documentary
